website_summaries.verdict: A bit of bling for a very low cost.
pros: Good quality and fits nicely in the hand
Not a macho statement for cars that have multiple drivers
cons: Has the gear placement etched on it, which is not so great if it’s not the same pattern as your auto

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, product style NOT as shown!!
customer_reviews.text: The shift knob I received, while it IS the same coloring, it's NOT what's pictured.. I received a larger, bulkier and (what really bothers me the most) a flat topped shifter.. I specifically ordered this one because of the tapering at the bottom and most importantly the top of the knob.. It's really kinda bothering me because it's NOT what's displayed... It is heavy, it is sturdy, the color is cool, I just wish it was the same style as shown in all the photos... If it was as shown in the photos it would be 5 stars... But it's not, so it's not...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Eaton KL7XL

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great shift knob!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2007 Mazda 3. I had bought other off of Amazon and other auto part stores and they disappointed, but not this gem. This is so beautiful and very sturdy aluminum. The adapter fit perfectly and I was able to thread it on in a minute. The only downfall I could say is during the summer this thing is on fire from the sun, but it is metal and not plastic or rubber so that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Good and  heavy, not a very good finish.
customer_reviews.text: To start with, it looks like I was sent a returned item, as the box had packaging tape wrapped all around it, and the adapters were all separated. Second issue it the finish isn't very strong. I laid the knob top side down on my wood counter top, and in the process of picking it up, the finish scraped off in a few spots. The good thing is it's a solid, heavy piece of metal, and not just thin crap. The item description says it comes with rubber adapters, but they aren't there, just the plastic threaded inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Metal in car plus summer heat=suck
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, colors are perfect, install was easy. But In the 100 degree weather, I cannot touch it when I get into the car. I have to keep a rag on it. Because I have blisters on my palm from having to rush somewhere and I didn't have a choice.
customer_reviews.author: Burrz

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but......
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly, in good packing shape but, product itself was NOT like the picture! I only ordered it because I have a VW New Beetle and the shift pattern is not like that of the others. Well, the one they sent me HAS a pattern etched into it, of course I sent it straight back. No problems with a return and a refund, really quick! I would have loved to see it in my baby car but, I'll have to buy something somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Kellee

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for so long and never reviewed it. It is absolutely awesome. My last shifting knob kept falling off while driving and I am so happy to have replaced it with this one. I have had no issues ( other than parking in direct sunlight on a hot day). This knob does heat up, but its metal so that's kind of a no brainer. If I ever need a new one, I will be coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. But comes with 3 plastic fittings
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. But comes with 3 plastic fittings, each a different size. One was too small. The other fit but but was too snug and left the shifter at the top of the shifter leaving a huge gap and making the shifter way taller then before. The last one was too big but left a smaller gap but wouldn't thread so ended up haveing to glue it on. And the knob came with a annoying burr in the metal witch is very annoying since I feel it everytime I drive.lastly it could be bigger. It's a bit on the small size.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Nice part, Great price, great quality, and adapters included. Finish has remained good. I was worried it would wear off or get scratched, but it's still awesome!! 😁
customer_reviews.author: karen rahming

customer_reviews.title: ... to say about the shift knob it looks just like the picture and it feels good
customer_reviews.text: nothing negative to say about the shift knob it looks just like the picture and it feels good. just need to get used to the feel because the stock shifter is way bigger. and be careful when shifting and make sure you actually grab it because your hands do slip
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Too cold, too hot
customer_reviews.text: This gear shift is very pretty and easy to install but it is made of aluminum which means that in the winter it is freezing and it the summer it is too hot to touch. I live in a fairly moderate climate and it is still unbearable at times. I do not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy baron

customer_reviews.title: 5 thumbs up!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I lovvvvveeee this knob for my shifter!!!!it actually came three days before it was scheduled to, so I went ahead and put it on and it is so beautiful to look at it every time I shift. I would recommend this to everyone that have a Honda...too bad I can't put the picture of what it looks like in my car I'm here lol
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Boyd

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to my car
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's made of metal and I don't like that it's made of metal because it gets very hot from the sun. I like that the installation was easy and the knob is very sturdy. A++
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Its metal, hope for moderate weather
customer_reviews.text: It fit and screwed on easily. My one complaint is that its metal. Scalding hot in the summer and frozen in the winter. I should have gotten a plastic one...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Young

customer_reviews.title: My Bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking, quality piece. However.. I bought this without consulting the services department at dealership first. Evidently starting at my year ('17) the Spark's entire assembly must be replaced and only with Chevy parts. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Fits ‘09 Honda Fit RS
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and just gets hot in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Gets VERY hot.
customer_reviews.text: Knob fits, looks good, but it gets preposterously hot in the summertime. I literally have to wear gloves if I get in my car on a hot day or I will burn the skin off of my hands. Also, I had to use adhesive to get it to stay centered so the pattern matched the actual shifting of my vehicle. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love it. Bought it for my daughters new car
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it. Bought it for my daughters new car. It seems like it will fit almost any standard shift. Have several inserts and the company also gives you a recommedation if no insert fits. Recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Popeye The Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Lasted one month in humid climate and then corroded
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, looks cool, and about $10 cheaper than the same thing sold in automotive parts stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnarson

customer_reviews.title: Torque the adapter on to keep knob low.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my 94 civic after my other knob broke. Some installation tips.. Use a vice grip to get the adapter lower than by hand.. just don't clamp onto the threads. There is a small landingat the bottom just wide enough to get torque with. Add some electrical tape to keep your boot from having a gap. Screw on the knob until tight and oriented correctly.
customer_reviews.author: B Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, definitely buy. The only negative is it gets REALLY hot in the summer. (Metal...of course!)
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: very cute in my car, actually worked out perfectly because the stock knob was crooked, this one stays on straight and is more comfortable for me. doesn’t feel cheap at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adapter doesn’t fit my cars shift screw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking it was going to fit just fine onto my cars shifter but the adapter kept on getting stuck on the shift screw. It was stuck at one point that I had to get a set of pliers to get a hold on it and pull it off in a circular motion upwards. Not satisfied with this product whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pizano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, shiny!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but didn't have the correct adapter for my 06 Mazda 3, close enough for now but will start turning after a bit. Very pretty and shiny, just like in the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Also I've slammed gears a few times with it and its never came off in my hand lol
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for my 94 celica and it fits with the adapter it has started to fade now. Got another one for my brothers civic and recieved a skunk knob he was pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Jayro

customer_reviews.title: 2005 Focus ST
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice feels good in my hand however if your shifter has a reverse lockout ring you pull up on to shift into reverse it will be a little loose because tightening it down firmly blocks the ring. Still love it though
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Product sent not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The product sent was as shown in my attached picture. With a flat top, not beveled. Still looks good just not as ergonomic. I even ordered a second one to see if it was an accident but it seems that's not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: People are constantly commenting on this. It looks really cool! Just make sure to keep it in the shade, as it gets really hot in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Looks a great
customer_reviews.text: The only detractor is the inserts thought they work fine I was hoping for a threaded steel insert.
customer_reviews.author: Steven c.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I will say that it does get hot/cold, but its bearable. I've had for 3 months now, and I still love how it looks on my car. The little keychain is so cute and looks great after dropping my keys a million times
customer_reviews.author: Angela Escobar

customer_reviews.title: I love this shift knob
customer_reviews.text: I love this shift knob. The size is on the smaller side but that doesn't affect my shifting negatively at all. In fact, my shifting is smoother than before! Only down side is that it gets cold in the chilly days and hot on the sunny days. But that's to be expected being metal. Overall I am very very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shifter is sooo pretty! It looks just as pictured. I can't wait to install it!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Ive had this for over a year now. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for over a year now. The aluminum appears to be bubbling under the coating. Still, it was so cheap, I dont have my feelings hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as pictured and easy to install on our Jeep Wrangler (TJ)
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured and easy to install on our Jeep Wrangler (TJ). I would give it 5 stars but it gets very hot during summer, other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Tx034

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: For the money it not bad but it’s a fingerprint magnet the coating on it seems to be somewhat durable we’ll see what happens after a couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: DeIze Roach

customer_reviews.title: SHIFTER KNOB
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it!! Matches me car & was easy to install!! Very sturdy also 🙃 5 STARS

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Put it in my 2007 mustang. I love it! Just gets pretty warm in the sun.

customer_reviews.title: My son loved his new gear shift
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his new gear shift. WE do too. Fits nicely in my hand. So much better shifting than with the big bulky one he had. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Jannifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shifter, matches perfectly with my pink car. Only downside is that it gets REALLY hot.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shift knob for the money just a little tiny bit loose

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice product,fit perfect,but was scratched on top ruining the look of the whole shifter ,other wise would have been 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of neo chrome! Matches my lugs caps and wire separators! Great quality!

customer_reviews.title: If you know it will fit get it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a 2005 Toyota Scion tC it fits great and is really sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Multi-color chrome looks great, feels nice. Comes with 3 different sizes of adapter threads, one of which fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on this knob. I wish the adapters were made of steel, mainly because I don't like plastic threading on things that receive wear.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very cool, it looks just like my burn tip exhaust. Feels a lot better than the shifter I had on my 07 cobalt.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tuner look
customer_reviews.text: Great product If you are looking for a quick way to jazz up the interior. It shines really cool when the light hits it. I got it for my 2011 honda fit. The plastic adapters made it fit right. It's a little small on the palms so u can't mind that.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it for his car!!! Easy to install and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: laurie keith

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! Looks great on my car, I ordered the matching quick release and wheel for my car also! You can get a good grip on it and it's not too big but not too small! The piece inside fit perfect! No complaints!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shifter
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pruduct great fitment it fits really nice and looks awesome. You can tell its quality made it doesn't look cheap at all. Only thing is if your hands are wet it will slip out of your hand due to it being a smooth metal finish but I love it

customer_reviews.title: great.. no regrets
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite shift knob to date. It doesnt have the weight but it looks almost identical to a skunk2 . It even has thr engravings. Fit my ep3. And my last car which was a 01 passat. Great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible the shift knob its painted so if you want ...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for that worn out stock shifting knob
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for that worn out stock shifting knob. Gives the car a racer appearance. Nice weight and feel.

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller than I thought and it's not weighted I love neochrome but the cheapness of it is evident

customer_reviews.title: ... on my car about a year now it only sucks when it gets cold but other then that love
customer_reviews.text: Been on my car about a year now it only sucks when it gets cold but other then that love it

customer_reviews.title: great product super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect this shifter know to be this nice! Looks great and is weighted well, shifts are way smoother and the adapter pieces were easy to install to my short shifter. I certainly recommend this if you are trying to get a low price knob with high price quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great freaking DEAL OMG MUCH JDM!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it it seemed kind of small but over time I got used to it. it feels really good In handa, top quality for sure they did not cheap out its a pretty good shift knob!!!

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: It was a tad smaller than expected, but it has definitely help with my shifting. I would recommend to get some kind of cover for it, it burns like the sun when it's hot.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this product

customer_reviews.text: Very east to install it's actually a skunk 2 shifter which was nice for the price...

customer_reviews.title: Color coming off
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad purchase, but the color rubs off of it quickly, started happening after only a couple months and wasn't very shiny anymore. Also in the winter it gets very Cold, and in the summer very hot. Just a heads up

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured....
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this seeing as it matches my lug nuts, however its not like the one pictured. The one they show has nothing etched onto it while the one I received has a shift pattern on it, I no it said manual but it fits in my automatic and that's why I ordered it. I was not expecting it to have anything on it. And of course there is no way to contact the seller to fix this issue. I don't want to return it but I see no other choice. Im disappointed in this purchase and wish it would have turned out better.

customer_reviews.title: May fade after a little while

product_meta.title: ZHOL Universal Aluminum Automotive Motorsport Fantasy Manual Stick Shift Knob,Gear Stick Shift Head,Gear Shift knob
product_meta.description:
General Introduction: 
1.High quality manual stick shift knob,Compatible with Universal fit for most vehicles with screw type shift knob. 
2.Fantastic Aluminum material give your car a performance look.Upgrade your driving comfort and interior appearance. Installation Guide: 
1.Dismount the original stick shift knob,measure the diameter size of the screw rod. 
2.Choose suitable rubber sleeve(3 size available:8mm,10mm,12mm). 
PS:what can we do if all of the three rubber sleeves are not suitable?choose a close size of a rubber sleeve,fasten it with adhesive tape,then screw the stick shift knob,all can be done! Package Details: 
1.Item Color:fantastic/colorful 
2.Item Size:56mm*40mm*19mm 
3.Item Weight:158g 
4.Package include:1*Manual Stick Shift Knob;3*Rubber Sleeves 
1 x GreatTree Smile Lanyard 
Warm Tip: 
Fits shifter hole diameter from 8mm - 12mm,hole depth 4cm,you can measure the original installation size.Kindly feel free to write to us if you need further assistance. 
Warning!!!...
